column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I was in bakery heaven!   We went for brunch on Sunday morning and enjoy all of our entrees (pain perdu
column2: breakfast flatbread and croque madam).    It was packed and crowded
column3: but the staff was very attentive and the food was quick and hot.  The pastries were amazing
column4: as well.   I will definitely be returning here on our next trip to Houston.
